alert.note: Alert for Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 27 at 3:06PM CDT until June 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR FWZ 436 AND 437 IN THE SOUTH NEBRASKA PANHANDLE WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 436 AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 436.Fire weather zone 437. * WIND...West to southwest winds 15 to 20 mph sustained with gusts to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity 10 to 13 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6 or Moderate to High potential for rapid fire growth. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions may develop. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
